Name: Where Wisdom Lights the Way
Description: A Roya girl pauses before a stone wall. She explains that it holds one of the foundations of the Roya tribe, a record of the operating patterns of the Reactor Drive. You decide to join her in relighting these petroglyphs, restoring the wisdom with which the Roya once measured their world and ensuring their brilliance never fades.
QuestDesc: A Roya girl pauses before a stone wall. She explains that it holds one of the foundations of the Roya tribe, a record of the operating patterns of the Reactor Drive. You decide to join her in relighting these petroglyphs, restoring the wisdom with which the Roya once measured their world and ensuring their brilliance never fades.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This must be it. It looks like this petroglyph has two parts.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But why are there Zip Zaps here? Were they attracted by the lighting system on the rock face?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It looks like someone deliberately damaged the wiring...
